Articles.Content:
I need help because ksp is very slow. I made the setting minimum but I am still getting a lot of lag please help.

PC specs:

Operating System
    Windows 7 Professional 64-bit SP1
CPU
    Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 @ 3.00GHz    39 °C
    Wolfdale 45nm Technology
RAM
    8.00GB Dual-Channel DDR3 @ 531MHz (7-7-7-20)
Motherboard
    Hewlett-Packard 3048h (XU1 PROCESSOR)
Graphics
    E2242 (1920x1080@60Hz)
    Intel Q45/Q43 Express Chipset (HP)
    Intel Q45/Q43 Express Chipset (HP)
Storage
    232GB Seagate ST3250318AS ATA Device (SATA)    29 °C
Optical Drives
    hp DVD A DH16ABLH ATA Device
Audio
    High Definition Audio Device

 

 

Edited May 9, 2017 by Commander223323

most of the time lag cant be fixed via low graphics settings, as KSP has to do alot of calculations and stuff. id recommend making a custom terrain detail preset so the game has less to render, it worked for me. the video i attached is a tutorial  to do it, and only requires a bit of computer knowledge. the video is from 2013, but it should work in the latest version.i can't guarntee it will fix the lag, but it did for me.

2 hours ago, Vall9X4562 said:

most of the time lag cant be fixed via low graphics settings, as KSP has to do alot of calculations and stuff. id recommend making a custom terrain detail preset so the game has less to render, it worked for me. the video i attached is a tutorial  to do it, and only requires a bit of computer knowledge. the video is from 2013, but it should work in the latest version.i can't guarntee it will fix the lag, but it did for me.

 

 

OK thanks.
